name: Egg Egg
description:
A simple random maze generator - find the exit!

Controls
  • WASD to move.
  • Mouse to look.
  • Space to pause.

🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚

Originally intended to make an Easter-themed dungeon crawler for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2021 - didn't have time. Would have included:

  • Health points, with collectable healing eggs
  • Enemies that chase you

Font: https://www.dafont.com/springtime.font

🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚

Issues
  • Polygon count is very high because of number of leaves
  • Graphics dropdown may not show the right value, but will change the settings.

🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚

Thanks to The Gumpy GameDev for the review: https://youtu.be/iJtmQvjTmJ4?t=3729.
